website_summaries.verdict: Asics adds a new line to its fairly limited trail shoes in the FujiEndurance. The shoe is moderately cushioned with average lugs that enable runners to transition from the road to the trail. Runners will really like its responsive ride with very noticeable ground feedback and water-repelling properties.
pros: The 6mm sockliner and the soft fabric lining deliver the kind of comfort runners look for in any shoe
The FujiEndurance’s durability is simply incredible, based on most comments
A good number of reviews consider the price tag is decent enough for a shoe of its kind
The traction of the FujiEndurance is very sticky and designed for wet conditions on mud, rocks, and technical trail
Asics designed the lugs that allow runners to take this shoe for a ride on the road
The flexibility and ground feedback of the shoe are moderate enough, despite the lugs and the rock protection plate
The Plasmaguard technology repels water and mud without sacrificing breathability
cons: Some runners found the heel counter as too stiff
The external heel counter and slightly firmer sole is a bit much on flat surfaces, according to some testers
A handful of testers considered the fit a bit too narrow

customer_reviews.title: GREAT RUNNING SHOES!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband, who works out and runs 5 times a week. He wanted something that would keep him from having soggy feet since we live in a relatively rainy place. So far these have done the job. This brand was recommended by my aunt, who does regular marathons. I have a pair of Asics myself and they fit great. The rock plate prevents pain from rocks/gravel, the the lugs do not pick up gravel, and the lace garage (in the tongue) prevents them from coming undone. He thinks they are amazing and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Christen McCarter

customer_reviews.title: Toes rub
customer_reviews.text: The rubber that protects your toes from getting wet rub against my toes and make them feel as though they are on the verge of blister after only a 5 mile trail run. If that issue were gone, this would be my new favorite shoe. Using thicker socks helps, but if your feet ever got wet, they would not dry. Maybe I just got a bad pair, but it was my first pair, and these shoes are too expensive to experiment with.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: ASICS are the best
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and well made shoe. Fit is great style is very cool. ASICS are the best Like the little extra feature of a shoe lace pocket at the top of the tongue
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L.

customer_reviews.title: Great look and fit
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband and he loves the shoes. The color looks great and the fit is great. Delivery was prompt and would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole A McClain

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe, especially for pronators....lots of support...eliminated my knee pain. Very good on roads too but wouldn't use then for road races. Good water protection and traction on trails.
customer_reviews.author: jane wilkens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice shoes. very light and very comfortable. fit is what I expected from ASICS - excellent. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rick W

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried them on the trail yet, but first impression is: comfortable fit, lugs on the sole seem fine as well as the cushion.
customer_reviews.author: RGC

customer_reviews.title: ... run to test them out and got a personal best time! No better shoes
customer_reviews.text: Went on a 5 mile rugged trail run to test them out and got a personal best time! No better shoes!
customer_reviews.author: G M MCCARTNEY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Completed a very muddy trail race and they worked great!!!! Love them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe just fits way too small. 12.5 was small and I regularly wear 12.
customer_reviews.author: Pm720

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE ASICS!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are BETTER than I expected. The fit is perfect and they are VERY comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Hottenstein

customer_reviews.title: Comfort winner!
customer_reviews.text: I may not be cool enough to wear these shoes! They are very stylish. My grandkids all think these are the ultimate tennis shoe. Very comfortable even after 13 hour work shifts. Breatheable, light, yet good support. A winner in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Don't have enough miles on them to have a useful comment. The laces are a bit short
customer_reviews.text: Don't have enough miles on them to have a useful comment. The laces are a bit short, but I can live with that.
customer_reviews.author: Perk

product_meta.title: ASICS Men’s Gel-FujiEndurance-M
product_meta.description: The GEL FujiEndurance shoe features PlasmaGuard technology to protect against rain and mud while maintaining breathability and flexibility. The trail-specific outsole features an aggressive impact pattern, specially designed for off-road runners in the fight against mountain and downward terrain with more traction.
feature_bullets: I.G.S (Impact Guidance System) Technology: ASICS design philosophy that uses linked components to improve the natural movement of the foot from heel stroke to toe area.
Trail Specific Outsole: The reverse eyelets provide traction on all types of terrain.
Stone protection plate: Provides protection from quarries
Water resistant outer fabric: Provides a highly water-repellent outer material without loss of breathability.
